<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thunder God's Fan](/Feats.aspx?ID=2444) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wind God's Fan](/Feats.aspx?ID=2440)

</column>

---

A wave of your fan unleashes the fury of the storm. You can Activate your _tengu feather fan_ one additional time per day. Add the 5th-level [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) spell to the spells contained within your fan.
